00025    class PointingLog {
00026       public:
00027          PointingLog(
00028             const MountVt& mountvt,
00029             const std::string& filename,
00030             const std::string& telescope
00031             ) throw(std::runtime_error, std::ios::failure);
00032          virtual ~PointingLog();
00033          void log(
00034             std::string id = ""
00035          ) throw(std::ios::failure);
00036          void log(
00037             double ra,
00038             double dec,
00039             std::string id = ""
00040          ) throw(std::ios::failure);         
00041          void mark();
00042          void comment( 
00043             const std::string& str
00044          ) throw(std::ios::failure);
00045       protected:
00046 
00048       /*
00049          The log method calls logAuxiliary to add auxiliary readings to the 
00050          log file. The default implementation of this does nothing and 
00051          to log auxiliary readings a derived class must be written which
00052          re-implements logAuxiliary.
00053 
00054          Readings may be added by writing up to 3 additional records each containing
00055          one double to the LogStream.
00056       */
00057          virtual void logAuxiliary(
00058             double aux[3]              
00059          ) {};
00060          std::ofstream LogStream;      
00061          const MountVt& Vt;            
00062          double Tai;                   
00063          double Ra;                    
00064          double Dec;                   
00065          double Wavel;                 
00066          double Roll;                  
00067          double Pitch;                 
00068          double Casspa;                
00069          double Xr;                    
00070          double Yr;                    
00071          double Fl;                    
00072          double Temp;                  
00073          double Press;                 
00074          double Humid;                 
00075          double Tlr;                   
00076          double Rcorr;                 
00077          double Aux[3];                
00078          bool Marked;                  
00079       private:
00080       // There is no default constructor, copy constructor or assignment op.
00081          PointingLog();
00082          PointingLog(const PointingLog&);
00083          PointingLog& operator=(const PointingLog&);
00084    };
